aSinglePlace: A single place to have all tenant documents verified and save time
generateAuniqueLink: Generate a unique link to send to leads to qualify themselves
getAreportOfYourLeads: Get a Report of Your Leads
pickChecks: Pick checks that fit your needs for each property you're leasing
chooseTheRightTenantsWithConfidence: Choose the Right Tenants with Confidence
seeHowLeadsQualify: See how leads qualify against your set criteria for the property
multipleScreenings: Multiple screenings that ensures you're not wasting time with unqualified leads
WeWillLetYouKnowOnce: We'll let you know once we launch and occasionally send updates

tenant.youHaveBeenInvited: You've been invited to submit your paystubs and verify your income.
tenant.pleaseUploadYourLast: Please upload your last 2 paystubs that you've received from your employer. We'll use it to verify your income.
tenant.chooseAFileOrDragAndDropItHere: Choose a file or drag & drop it here
tenant.pdfJpegPng: PDF, JPEG, PNG, formats, up to 2MB
tenant.weConnectToYourBankSecurely:
We connect to your bank securely via Plaid to verify your income. Please connect
the same bank account where you receive your income.
tenant.interestingFactAboutPlaid:
Interesting fact about Plaid: 1 in 3 US adults has connected a
financial account to an app with Plaid
tenant.youAreAllSetToGetVerified: You're All Set to Get Verified!
tenant.pleaseCheckWeHaveTheRightInfoHere: Please check we have the right info here.
